alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 08 at 8:28PM CDT until May 12 at 11:17AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River at Fenton. Meramec River near Arnold. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River at Pacific. Meramec River at Valley Park. Meramec River near Eureka. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River near Arnold. * WHEN...Until late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Wells Road below Suson Woods begins flooding at this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 29.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Sunday was 29.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 29.7 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 7 pm Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Meramec River Arnold 24.0 29.2 29.3 25.5 22.7 21.1 18.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
